issue.title: [Python] parquet documentation outdated on nthreads argument
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5301](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5301). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
<https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/parquet.html#multithreaded-reads> still mentions `nthreads` instead of `use_threads`.

 

From https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/26340

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5301?focusedCommentId=16841298) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4326
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4326>
